trans-unit.source: Choose an organization to search for and staff resources.

seg-source.mrk: Choose an organization to search for and staff resources.

target.mrk: 选择一个组织来搜索和配备人力资源。

trans-unit.source: Defines the organization from which resources can be staffed.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the organization from which resources can be staffed.

target.mrk: 定义可从中配备人力资源的组织。

trans-unit.source: You use delivery organizations to manage cross-location staffing, or strategic planning for reasons such as project budget or resource availability.

seg-source.mrk: You use delivery organizations to manage cross-location staffing, or strategic planning for reasons such as project budget or resource availability.

target.mrk: 使用交付组织管理跨地点人员配备，或针对项目预算或资源可用性等原因的战略计划。

trans-unit.source: If you select a delivery organization, you can search for and staff resources only from the cost centers assigned to the specified organization.

seg-source.mrk: If you select a delivery organization, you can search for and staff resources only from the cost centers assigned to the specified organization.

target.mrk: 如果您选中了一个交付组织，您仅可以从分配到指定组织的成本中心搜索和配备人力资源。

trans-unit.source: If you do not select a delivery organization, you can search for and staff resources from any of the delivery organizations that belong to the same company code as the project's service organization. When a resource is assigned to a role, the delivery organization of the resource is automatically filled.

seg-source.mrk: If you do not select a delivery organization, you can search for and staff resources from any of the delivery organizations that belong to the same company code as the project's service organization.
When a resource is assigned to a role, the delivery organization of the resource is automatically filled.

target.mrk: 如果不选择交付组织，您可以搜索并配备属于项目服务组织的相同公司代码的所有交付组织内的资源。
当资源分配到角色时，将自动填充资源的交付组织。

trans-unit.source: To enable the system to search for resources, you must ensure that cost centers are assigned to relevant service organizations. You can manage these assignments in the app <uicontrol>Maintain Service Organizations</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: To enable the system to search for resources, you must ensure that cost centers are assigned to relevant service organizations.
You can manage these assignments in the app <uicontrol>Maintain Service Organizations</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 要使系统能够搜索资源，必须确保成本中心分配至相关服务组织。
您可以在<uicontrol>维护服务组织</uicontrol>应用中管理这些分配。
